Analog Array Sensors
====================

Displays
--------

For diagnostic purposes, a simple display is available which can be added to any [PAMGuard user display](../../../displays/userDisplayHelp/docs/userDisplayPanel.html).

This will show the configuration and the latest value read from each sensor channel.

  
![Accelerometer side panel](images/analogarraydisplay.png)  

Hover the mouse over any item for additional information.
